content:
In a profile of Observation I want to restrict values to ages. Is there any way to use the Age data type for this?
Otherwise I can reproduce the logic from the definition of Age in my profile.
It seems Age is a constrain on Quantity, so you should be able to use it.. Where do you want to use it? and are you using fsh or editing the StructureMaps directly?

I'm editing StructureDefinitions directly. If I try to set the type to Age I make the IGPublisher crash.

at Observation.value[x]: illegal constrained type Age from Quantity, CodeableConcept, string, boolean, integer, Range, Ratio, SampledData, time, dateTime, Period in http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation

Found it!
Leave type.code as Quantity and set type.profile to "Age"
I thought that Age was not a profile of Quantity, but it is.
Richard Townley-O'Neill has marked this topic as resolved.
